SERVER_ONLY: This command can only be used on a server!
DM_ONLY: This command can only be used in my DMs!
NSFW_CHANNEL_ONLY: This command can only be used in a NSFW channel!
NSFW_DISABLED: This server does not have NSFW commands enabled! Message an Admin if you think this is wrong.
USER_MISSING_PERMISSION: This command requires you to have the `{PERMISSION}` permission!
BOT_MISSING_PERMISSION: I need the the `{PERMISSION}` permission to use this command!
WRONG_USAGE: You did not use this command correctly. The correct usage is `{USAGE}`.
NO_USER_FOUND: You did not provide a valid user. Please run the command again and provide one.
NO_MEMBER_FOUND: You did not provide a valid member. Please run the command again and provide one.
NO_ROLE_FOUND: You did not provide a valid role. Please run the command again and provide one.
MULTIPLE_USERS_FOUND: I found multiple users matching your input
MULTIPLE_MEMBERS_FOUND: I found multiple members matching your input
MULTIPLE_ROLES_FOUND: I found multiple roles matching your input
PROMPT: I found multiple matches. Please select one from below by typing ONLY the number!
PROMPT_TIMEOUT: I found multiple matches but the prompt to select one ran out. Please run the command again!
INVALID_CHOICE: That was not a valid choice! Please run the command again.
